name: Deeper Blue Sea Post LD48
description:
Improved version of the original game made for Ludum Dare 48.

Post Jam version with these features:

  • Animated environment.  
  • Swim animation for all the fish. 
  • One more level added.

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Try to survive by eating the rest of the fish.
  • Make them smaller by hitting them with your tail before trying to eat them (they can hit you as well).
  • Number of level indicates the strength (size) of your enemies.
  • Be careful! If you get in the way of a bigger fish you will get eaten!
  • Controls:
    • ARROWS to move around.
    • SPACEBAR to hit with your tail.
    • CONTROL to eat another fish.
